paragraphs: Cloud Engineer with 3 years of experience designing, deploying, and optimizing secure, scalable cloud infrastructures on AWS. Skilled in CI/CD, Terraform, Kubernetes/EKS/AKS, cloud migration, and performance optimization.

Experienced in building high-availability environments, automating deployments, and ensuring compliance with HIPAA, SOC2, and FINRA. Strong problem-solving skills with a focus on reliability, scalability, and cost-efficiency.
